titles.title: Referring the bill (H.R. 2196) for the relief of John W. Ruth, Sr., to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 5/19/1993--Introduced. Refers a specified bill for the relief of a named individual to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims.
